item.description: Actual Position Assistant Professor (non-tenured) Jan 1, 2022 - Ongoing University of Verona, Italy – Dept. of Computer Science INF/01 (Computer Science) Past Positions Postdoctoral Research Assistant Oct 1, 2021 - Dec 31, 2021 (3 months) University of Verona, Italy – Dept. of Computer Science Automatic black-box testing of RESTful API Supervisor Dr. Mariano Ceccato (University of Verona, Italy) REST APIs 路 Back-box testing 路 Blockchain 路 Static analysis 路 Smart-contracts
